name: Mirror
description:
Do you belive in the local beliefs? 
There are many taboo beliefs that the elders have told us and one of those forbidden tales is the story about the mirror. 

There are many stories about mirrors. But one that I've heard is to forbid us to look in the mirror after turning off the light. 

There is a belief that if we looked at ourselves in the mirror after extinguishing the light, our shadow would pull us into the mirror or replace us in the real world. I was told that the person's personality would change to the opposite overnight as well.

Spooky, right? And you still dare to look at the mirror in the dark?
